name: ITP - C1503B - Mautaua Under Slip - Master ITP
template name: ITP - C1503B - Mautaua Under Slip - Master ITP

name: 1 - Confirm Solution is Appropriate for the Site
Detail - Confirm the applicability of the solution for the site
Frequency - Prior to commencement of construction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - To be confirmed by the CPS Engineer/Geotechnical Engineer
Detail - Once all ESC controls have been installed & the Tree Felling & Vegetation Clearance has been carried out
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Detail - Confirm buttress extents and rock armouring toe extents
Frequency - At completion of topsoil strip, before Toe construction
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection by the Geotechnical Design Manager
Conformance Criteria - Buttress dimensions to be confirmed by CPS Engineer, including toe dimensions and placement.
Detail - Confirm Buttress foundation to be on suitable natural ground
Frequency - At completion of site clearing and foundation excavation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection by the CPS Engineer
Conformance Criteria - Foundation to be suitable natural ground
Detail - Confirm Slope face is 2H:1V if its required to be as steep as 1.5H:1V CPS Engineer approval is required
Frequency - At completion of clearing and foundation excavation
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection by the CPS Engineer
Detail - Bulk fill to be approved by the Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - Rock of GAP65, 100, or 150 grading. Broken faces.
Records - CS-4020 Bulk Fill Earthworks Record Check Sheet, material receipt
Detail - Rock Armour to be approved by the Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing

Conformance Criteria - Rock armour shall be hard, durable, crushed, quarried or natural stone free from dust, clay, organic matter and other deleterious material. the stone shall be free from laminations and cleavages and shall not disintegrate on exposure to weathering.
○ Rock to be SG 2,350kg with a D50 of 450mm
8 - Mega Flow Strip Drain or Drainage Blanket
Detail - If seepage is present in the slip scarp mega flow strip drain or a drainage blanket is required.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure Bidim complies with specification
Detail - Lay Bidim A39 geofabric over the slip between the existing ground and the bulk fill. Lay Bidim A49 between the bulk fill and the rock armouring.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Ensure Bidim complies with specification
Detail - Check that the geofabric have been installed in accordance with the manufacturers specification - overlaps and pin centres
Frequency - On completion of geofabric installation before fill is placed
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Use of the correct geotextile at back and base of cut - Check information on the delivery docket against the requirements indicated on the Drawings.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Delivery dockets with roll details. Class D placed at back and base of cut.
Detail - Filling carried out in fully drained conditions with no free water on the working surfaces. Any erosion to be repaired immediately
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection

Detail - Site Engineer to check embankment slopes for location, line and level as the fill progresses ensuring that batter faces are overfilled and trimmed back so that so that the fill is well compacted to the edge
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Line and level to be worked through with CPS throughout layer installation
Detail - Fill placed in horizontal layers no greater than 300mm and compacted. Site Engineer to instruct lab when and where to carry out testing
Frequency - testing low middle and top of buttress
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection and NDM Testing
Conformance Criteria - Fill shall be compacted in accordance with NZ4431: 2022
Detail - Use of the correct geotextile at back and base of cut - Check information on the delivery docket against the requirements indicated on the Drawings.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Delivery dockets with roll details. Class D placed at back and base of cut.
Detail - Check that the geofabric have been installed in accordance with the manufacturers specification - overlaps and pin centres
Frequency - On completion of geofabric installation before fill is placed
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Use of the correct geogrid between slope face and rock armour- Check information on the delivery docket against the requirements indicated on the Drawings.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Delivery dockets with roll details. Bidim A49 placed between rock armour and slope face.

Detail - Ensure that placement of rock material is placed in such a manner to minimise segregation and avoid displacement of underlying materials. Oversize rock to be placed such to minimise voids. CPS Engineer given notice to visually inspect initial placement of riprap material
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - CPS Engineer to be informed of unsuitable ground or seepage in Trench and instruct testing and remedial works.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - CPS Engineer to instruct action
Detail - Location to be determined by CPS Engineer
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Trenching location and direction to be confirmed by CPS Engineer
Detail - Ensure drainage outlet from pavement connects to buttress fill if required
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Confirm drainage connection if required
Detail - Refer to Pavement and Surfacing ITP's
Detail - Ensure all subsoil drainage lines comply with design prior to carrying on with next construction process
Frequency - At completion of sub soil drainage line
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Detail - Ensure all NCRs are closed and included within QA file, Delivery Dockets and Lab Testing Spreadsheet and Test Reports to be included in QA File
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
Records - Delivery Dockets, Test Reports, Lab Testing Register
Detail - Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
Frequency - At the completion of the Lot of work
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Drawings
